CustomField.description: Account.Capacity is synced from the Account's Primary Contact through a flow (the same one that controls RM, PM, Constituency, Sub-Constituency)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indication of how much a constituent might be able to donate. Capacity is synced across the Account and all Contacts. Please make all edits to Capacity on the Primary Contact's record •AAAA - $100M +, • AAA - $50M - $99.9M, •AA - $25M - $49.9M •A - $10M - $24.9M, •B - $5M - $9.9M, •C - $1M - $4.9M •D - $500K - $999.9K, •E - $100K - $499.9K, •F - $25K – 99.9K
CustomField.label: Capacity
